description: Egress Queues Rate limit configuration for port
title: PortQueuesRateLimit

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

port_id.description: Port ID. port_id and queues_direction are required to uniquely identify the queue_rate_percentage to be set

queues_direction.description: Queue traffic direction. port_id and queues_direction are required to uniquely identify the queue_rate_percentage to be set

queue_rate_percentage.description: Rate limit for each egress queue in percentage Apply the default value on all queues to reset the configuration
